description: To provide scholarships to current UCO students who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.0 GPA Must be a current, active member of at least one of the following three organizations: HASA, the Hispanic Success Initiative, or Student Support Services LA META Program Open to Undergraduate or Graduate students Provide a personal statement of 1.5-2 pages (max) explaining your background, life goals, and career goals This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
